content:
Hi.

I am doing some performancetesting on the c# validationcode. It takes about 20 seconds to validate a bundle with 740 entries. When doing each of those entries in parallell threads it takes under 4 seconds. Will do some more performancetests. We will use the parallell-functionality on our fhirserver unless the performance gets a lot better.
As this is a dotnet specific topic, best taken to the dotnet channel here https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/dotnet
